steps.prompt:
Break down Episode {{episodeNumber}}: {{episodeTitle}}

SERIES SYNOPSIS:
{{synopsis}}

FOCUS CHARACTER: {{focusCharacter}}
MAIN CONFLICT: {{mainConflict}}
END HOOK: {{endHook}}

Generate detailed episode breakdown:

## EPISODE OVERVIEW
- Title: {{episodeTitle}}
- Runtime: Estimated minutes
- Tone: Overall emotional tone

## COLD OPEN (2-3 minutes)
- Scene description
- Hook to grab attention
- Characters involved

## ACT 1 - SETUP (First 25%)
### Scene 1
- Location: INT/EXT, Place, Time
- Characters: Who's present
- Action: What happens
- Dialogue snippet: Key line
- Duration: Estimated time

[Continue for 2-3 more scenes]

## ACT 2 - CONFRONTATION (Middle 50%)
[4-6 scenes with same detail]

## ACT 3 - RESOLUTION (Final 25%)
[2-3 scenes leading to cliffhanger]

## B-PLOT
- Subplot description
- How it weaves into main plot

## CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
- {{focusCharacter}}'s arc this episode
- Key growth moments

## CLIFFHANGER/HOOK
- Final scene description
- What question it raises
- Setup for next episode
